title: Caribbean beans
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1/2 green pepper, chopped', '120ml water', '1 (410g) tin haricot beans', '180g passata', '1 1/2 teaspoons minced garlic', '1 sprig coriander, coarsely chopped', '4 tablespoons peeled and diced calabaza (or butternut squash)', '1 (5g) sachet sazon seasoning', '1 chicken stock cube', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 pinch ground cumin']
